title: Best of The Herd for Jul 31, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Jul 31, 2020
description:
The return of the NBA looks fantastic


Colin recaps the Lakers-Clippers game last night


The Pelicans need to stop putting Zion Williamson on minute restrictions


Most people complaining about NBA players kneeling are simply miserable people


The Buccaneers could very well make it to the Super Bowl



Guest: 5 time NBA All-Star Chris Webber

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
